title.value: Теоретическая и практическая разработка специализированного программного обеспечения для свиноводства
The theoretical and practical development of a  specialized software for pig breeding

person.name: Solyanik, S.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The basic approaches to create specialized systems and technology optimization software for the needs of the pig were detailed. In the spreadsheet application presents the main computer simulations to solve practical problems in the functioning pig farms. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. The results of the monitoring process and zoohygienic pig farm operation, monitoring of the economic and financial aspects of pig-breeding enterprise were presented. There were considered such questions as general aspects of computer science, theoretical foundations of programming, the basic approach of optimization of software technology for the needs of the pig; creation of specialized information systems for pig production, including online tutorials, features a spreadsheet in pig; zoohygienic technology and monitor the functioning of the pig farm; monitoring of the economic and financial aspects of pig enterprise.
